reviewText: Showing the roots of Gustavo Dudamel, one of the most brilliant young conductors of our time, this documentary gives insights into how this amazing young musician (now only 30!) rose through the El Sistema program of music training in Venezuela to become one of the world's most sought-after conductors of the 21st century.  Now the principal conductor of the renowned LA Philharmonic, this charismatic musician is a principal force behind bringing classical music to the masses to transform their lives into meaningful contributors to society.  Everyone should know about Dudamel and El Sistema and how it is transforming our world--one person at a time!
